text: Bar Hopping is a 2000 American made-for-television comedy film directed by Steve Cohen starring Robert Hegyes, Tom Arnold, Linda Favila, Nicole Sullivan, John Henson, Anson Downes, Romy Windsor, Scott Baio and Kevin Nealon. ==Synopsis== In the film, a myriad of Generation X couples try to comprehend love in the bar scene. ==External links== * NicoleSullivan.org - 'Nicole Sullivan in Bar Hopping' * Category:2000 television films Category:2000 films Category:American films Category:2000 comedy films Category:American comedy films
title: Bar Hopping
